## tri2 variable

Applies `p` to the two input values `x y`<!-- -->, then same with `q`<!-- -->, and finally with `r`<!-- -->.

( x y p q r -- pxy qxy rxy )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tri2: import("./api").StackFn
```
